boardgame.name: Sentinelas do Multiverso
Sentinels of the Multiverse
Sentinels of the Multiverse: Enhanced Edition
boardgame.description: A mad scientist holds the world hostage with his terrifying inventions. An alien warlord from a far away galaxy brings his limitless army of bizarre minions to conquer the planet. A giant rampaging robot cuts a swath of destruction across the coast, destroying major population centers. And who will stand in their way? A team of heroes, all with impressive powers and abilities stand between the world and the forces of evil. Will you help them? Answer the call to protect the multiverse!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Sentinels of the Multiverse is a cooperative, fixed-deck card game with a comic book flavor. Each player plays as one of ten heroes, against one of four villains, and the battle takes place in one of four different dynamic environments._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player, after selecting one of the heroes, plays a deck of 40 cards against the villain and environment decks, which _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;play themselves_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, requiring the players to put the top card of the appropriate deck into play on the villain and environment turns. On each player's turn, they may play a card from their hand, use a power printed on one of their cards in play, and draw a card from their deck. Each round starts with the villain turn, continues clockwise around the table, then concludes with the environment turn. Each villain has various advantages, such as starting with certain cards in play, as specified by the villain character card. Play continues until the heroes reduce the villain to 0 or fewer HP, or until the villain defeats the heroes, either via a win condition or by reducing all the heroes to 0 or fewer HP._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Greater Than Games, LLC (GTG0001E) A mad scientist holds the world hostage with his terrifying inventions. An alien warlord from a far away galaxy brings his limitless army of bizarre minions to conquer the planet. A giant rampaging robot cuts a swath of destruction across the coast, destroying major population centers. And who will stand in their way? A team of heroes, all with impressive powers and abilities stand between the world and the forces of evil. Will you help them? Answer the call to protect the multiverse! Sentinels of the Multiverse is the award-winning game in which players join forces as heroes to combat a dastardly villain in a dynamic environment! The Enhanced Edition features thicker card stock, a larger box, divider cards, tokens, and villain scaling mechanics, but the same great gameplay and mechanics that Sentinels fans know and love!
Includes both expansions, 4 promo cards and the extra hero and villain decks. Reserved for CdubD.

for user scralmer

Enhanced Edition with just about everything ever published for this game, all for one great price. Everything is in perfect (like-new) condition -- most of the cards have never been used. The only wear is some on the divider cards inside the box. Includes enhanced edition box that fits all of the cards and then the Shattered Timelines box that holds the tokens and oversized villain cards. Includes: 1) Enhanced Edition 2) Infernal Relics Expansion 3) Rook City Expansion 4) Shattered Timelines Expansion 5) Unity Hero mini-expansion 6) Ambuscade Villain mini-expansion 7) Miss Information Villain mini-expansion 8) The Scholar Hero mini-expansion 9) The Final Wasteland Environment mini-expansion 10) Silver Gulch Environment mini-expansion 11) Over-sized villain cards (for every villain) If you buy this today from CSI, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll pay $67.40 not counting the base game which is currently out of stock (MSRP is $40 on that). In addition, you receive the following promo cards that are not readily available for purchase: 1) Eternal Haka Promo Card 2) Dark Visionary Promo Card 3) Vengeful Baron Blade Promo Card 4) Cosmic Omnitron Promo Card 5) Redeemer Fanatic Promo Card 6) Ra - Horus of Two Horizons Promo Card 7) Freedom Six Promo Pack (6 cards) Finally, this includes an extra un-punched set of damage tokens. In other words, you get everything ever published for Sentinels (the Vengeance expansion is not published yet) *except* the following: Young Legacy Promo Card, Rook City the Wraith Promo Card, and America_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Greatest Legacy Promo Card. That means you get everything other than these three hard-to-find promo cards (which give you alternate versions of the same heroes you do receive). I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not sure of the value of the promo cards since none of them are currently for sale on the BGG Marketplace. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is $15 for USPS Priority Mail with tracking (insurance is optional if you want to pay for it). International shipping will be ACTUAL SHIPPING COST PLUS USD$5.00 (sorry, it is a much bigger hassle on my end, plus I need to provide the box). Contact me BEFORE PURCHASING if you have any questions about shipping. Must pay me via PayPal (I will cover the fees).
This is the first edition. Decks have never been rubber banded, they are bound with Hugo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Magic Tape. Shipping is USPS Priority.

Greater Than Games (GTG0001E) A mad scientist holds the world hostage with his terrifying inventions. An alien warlord from a far away galaxy brings his limitless army of bizarre minions to conquer the planet. Greater Than Games (GTG0001E) A mad scientist holds the world hostage with his terrifying inventions. An alien warlord from a far away galaxy brings his limitless army of bizarre minions to conquer the planet. A giant rampaging robot cuts a swath of destruction across the coast, destroying major population centers. And who will stand in their way? A team of heroes, all with impressive powers and abilities stand between the world and the forces of evil. Will you help them? Answer the call to protect the multiverse! Sentinels of the Multiverse is the award-winning game in which players join forces as heroes to combat a dastardly villain in a dynamic environment! The Enhanced Edition features thicker card stock, a larger box, divider cards, tokens, and villain scaling mechanics, but the same great game play and mechanics that Sentinels fans know and love!
